select id,item from sale where id=#{id} and sdate=#{sdate}
mapper.insert: insert into sale(id,sdate,item,ea,total) values (#{id}, #{sdate}, #{item}, #{ea}, (select price*#{ea} from menu where item=#{item}))
mapper.select: select sdate,item,ea,total from sale where id=#{id} and sdate=#{sdate} order by sdate
mapper.update: update sale set ea=#{ea},total=(select price*#{ea} from menu where item=#{item}) where id=#{id} and item=#{item} and sdate=#{sdate}
mapper.select: select distinct('20'||(to_char(to_date(sdate,'yy-mm-dd'),'YYMMDD')))as sdate from sale where id=#{id} order by sdate
select count(item) from sale where id=#{id} and sdate=#{sdate} and item=#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into other(id,sdate,rent,sal,mcost,duty,prcost,etcco) values (#{id}, #{year}||#{mon}, TO_CHAR(#{rent}||'0000'), TO_CHAR(#{sal}||'0000'),TO_CHAR(#{mcost}||'0000'), TO_CHAR(#{duty}||'0000'), TO_CHAR(#{prcost}||'0000'),(TO_CHAR(#{rent}||'0000') + TO_CHAR(#{sal}||'0000') +TO_CHAR(#{mcost}||'0000') + TO_CHAR(#{duty}||'0000') + TO_CHAR(#{prcost}||'0000')))
mapper.select: select id,sdate,rent,sal,mcost,duty,prcost,etcco from other where id=#{id} order by sdate
select distinct sdate from other where id=#{id} order by sdate
mapper.update: update other set rent=TO_CHAR(#{rent}||'0000'),sal=TO_CHAR(#{sal}||'0000'),mcost=TO_CHAR(#{mcost}||'0000'),duty=TO_CHAR(#{duty}||'0000'),prcost=TO_CHAR(#{prcost}||'0000'),etcco=(TO_CHAR(#{rent}||'0000') + TO_CHAR(#{sal}||'0000') +TO_CHAR(#{mcost}||'0000') + TO_CHAR(#{duty}||'0000') + TO_CHAR(#{prcost}||'0000')) where id=#{id} and sdate=#{sdate}
mapper.select: select count(sdate) from other where id=#{id} and sdate=#{year}||#{mon}

select sdate,(etcco)as etcco from other where id=#{id} order by sdate
